New Records: Rohit Sharma (4165) vaulted past Virat Kohli (4103) to the top of the run-scoring leaderboard in T20Is.
Key Match Events: Jofra Archer lbw b Bumrah 21 (15b 1x4 2x6 17m) SR: 140
Pre-Game Insights: England's head coach Matthew Mott: 'Both teams are going to go out there and throw punches at each other for 40-odd overs. It's going to be a great contest.'
India captain Rohit Sharma: 'Wherever we play, whether it's bilateral series or ICC tournaments, the Indian cricket team is always under pressure. That's the fact.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: India are unbeaten in the T20 World Cup 2024
England have got to the semi-final with some hiccups
The match was played in Providence, Guyana, with a run rate of 6.20 and an average of 14.67
Spin has been a significant weapon at Providence in this tournament, with 27 wickets falling in five previous matches
Others: The match was a 2nd semi-final in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
India will progress to the final after topping their group in the Super Eight if the match is washed out
